text: Marcelino Menéndez y Pelayo (November 3, 1856 – May 19, 1912Fallecimiento de Marcelino Menéndez y Pelayo Hemeroteca de La Vanguardia. Edición del martes, 21 mayo 1912, página 11 (in Spanish)) was a Spanish scholar, historian and literary critic. Even though his main interest was the History of ideas, and Hispanic philology in general, he also cultivated poetry, translation and philosophy. == References == Category:Spanish writers Category:1856 births Category:1912 deaths
title: Marcelino Menéndez Pelayo
